text: Watcher reads [[sources]] config ONCE at startup — if sources were added to kg.toml after the watcher started, run `kg reload` (SIGHUP) or `kg stop && kg start` for the watcher to pick them up. It won't auto-detect config changes between restarts.

`kg debug` Sources row shows '0 files · 0 chunks' (or no stats row at all) when [[sources]] is configured but watcher hasn't indexed yet — file_sources table is empty. Check watcher logs for 'sources=0' to confirm. [[kg-architecture]]
Watcher log line 'inotify watching nodes=..., sources=N' shows how many sources were loaded at startup — sources=0 means kg.toml had no [[sources]] when the watcher started, even if they exist now.
